SELECT p.post_idx, m.nickname AS nickname, p.subject, p.b_hit AS b_hit, p.reg_date, p.post_cmt, p.`public` AS isPublic, p.blind, p.tmp,
-- 좋아요 수 IFNULL((SELECT COUNT(*) FROM liked l WHERE l.post_idx = p.post_idx), 0) AS total_like_count, -- 댓글 수 IFNULL((SELECT COUNT(*) FROM comment c WHERE c.post_idx = p.post_idx), 0) AS total_comment_count, -- 별점 평균 IFNULL((SELECT ROUND(AVG(s.star), 0) FROM star s WHERE s.post_idx = p.post_idx), 0) AS star_average
FROM post p LEFT JOIN member m ON p.user_id = m.user_id
(
p.subject LIKE CONCAT('%', #{subject}, '%')
OR
m.nickname LIKE CONCAT('%', #{nickname}, '%')
)
AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM tag_course tc LEFT JOIN tag t ON tc.idx = t.tag_idx AND tc.`class` = 'tag' LEFT JOIN tag_area ta ON tc.idx = ta.area_tag_idx AND tc.`class` = 'area_tag' WHERE tc.post_idx = p.post_idx AND ( t.tag_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{tag}, '%') OR ta.tag_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{tag}, '%') ) )
AND 1 = 0
